name: Arrow Fight
description: You play as one of two characters trying to beat each other in a crossbow fight. The game supports two players. You control player 1 (left) with W to move up, A to move left, S to move down, D to move right, Q to aim upwards, E to aim downwards, and Space bar to shoot. For Player 2 (right) controls: Up arrow is move up, down arrow is move down, left arrow is move left, right arrow is move right, 9 to aim upwards, 7 to aim downwards, and K to shoot. This game also supports game controllers if you choose to play it with one. Left analog stick is to move in any direction, right analog stick is to aim up or down, and right shoulder trigger is to shoot. Get as much points as you can before the timer runs out.
